#{contactAddressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLIGHT_NUMBER_TYPE = #{flightNumberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_PASS_OWN_DEPARTMENT = #{isPassOwnDepartment,jdbcType=CHAR}, COLLECTION_DEPARTMENT = #{collectionDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENSE_PLATE_NUM = #{licensePlateNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HANDOVER_STATUS = #{handoverStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_OUTER_BRANCH = #{isOuterBranch,jdbcType=CHAR}, ORDER_VEHICLE_NUM = #{orderVehicleNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kilometer =#{kilometer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_ADD_CODE = #{isAddCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, ADD_CODE_TIME = #{addCodeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RETURN_TYPE = #{returnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINAL_WAYBILL_NO = #{originalWaybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPRESS_EMP_CODE = #{expressEmpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPRESS_EMP_NAME = #{expressEmpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPRESS_ORG_CODE = #{expressOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPRESS_ORG_NAME = #{expressOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDA_SERIAL = #{pdaSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_TRADE_SERIAL = #{bankTradeSerail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_PENDING P WHERE P.ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (P.WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR P.ORDER_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT PENDING.WAYBILL_NO WAYBILLNO, PENDING.GOODS_WEIGHT_TOTAL WEIGHT, PENDING.GOODS_QTY_TOTAL PIECES, PENDING.GOODS_VOLUME_TOTAL VOLUME, PENDING.PRE_PAY_AMOUNT PAYAMOUNT, 'Y' ISHAVESIGNBILL, PENDING.LICENSE_PLATE_NUM VEHICLENO, PENDING.BILL_TIME BILLTIME FROM PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_PENDING PENDING
WHERE PENDING.BILL_TIME >= #{queryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND PENDING.BILL_TIME < TRUNC(SYSDATE)+1 AND PENDING.DRIVER_CODE = #{driverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PENDING.PENDING_TYPE = #{pendingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT WAYBILL.WAYBILL_NO WAYBILLNO, WAYBILL.GOODS_WEIGHT_TOTAL WEIGHT, WAYBILL.GOODS_QTY_TOTAL PIECES, WAYBILL.GOODS_VOLUME_TOTAL VOLUME, WAYBILL.PRE_PAY_AMOUNT PAYAMOUNT, 'Y' ISHAVESIGNBILL, WAYBILL.LICENSE_PLATE_NUM VEHICLENO, WAYBILL.BILL_TIME BILLTIME FROM PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL WAYBILL
WHERE WAYBILL.BILL_TIME >= #{queryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND WAYBILL.BILL_TIME < TRUNC(SYSDATE)+1 AND WAYBILL.DRIVER_CODE = #{driverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND WAYBILL.PENDING_TYPE = #{pendingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) as num from PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_PENDING p where p.ACTIVE='Y'
select count(1) as num from PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_PENDING p where p.ACTIVE='Y' and p.create_org_code = #{createOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
